label.title: Shown in the Neos UI
label.description: Can be "i18n" for automatic translation based on the name, a translation shorthand string like "My.Package:NodeTypes.MyContent:ui.label", or a simple string.
label.x-intellij-html-description:
Examples:

  • i18n looks automatically for a matching translation based on the name
  • My.Package:NodeTypes.MyContent:ui.label uses translation shorthand string
  • Some static label

icon.title: Shown in the Neos UI
icon.description: All free FontAwesome 5 icons can be referenced by their icon-classes. For backwards compatibility reason you can still use a "icon-" prefix.
icon.x-intellij-html-description:
All free FontAwesome 5 icons can be referenced by their icon-classes. For backwards compatibility reason you can still use a "icon-" prefix.

Examples:

  • fas fa-home
  • icon-home

minimumResultsForSearch.description: The minimum number of items before the search box is shown. If set to -1 it will always be hidden.

editor.title: Will render a checkbox in the Neos UI

minLabel.description: If set, this value is displayed instead of the minimum value.

maxLabel.description: If set, this value is displayed instead of the maximum value.

step.description: The step attribute is a number that specifies the granularity that the value must adhere to.

unit.description: The value gets displayed beside the current value, as well after the minimal value (only if `minLabel` is not set) and after the maximal value (only if ``maxLabel`` is not set). (The unit is just a visual indicator and will not be added to the resulting property value.)

disabled.description: If set to `true`, the range editor gets disabled.

min.description: The lowest value in the range of permitted values. This value must be less than or equal to the value of the max attribute.

max.description: The greatest value in the range of permitted values. This value must be greater than or equal to the value of the min attribute.

blockquote.description: Allows wrapping text in a blockquote tag (Neos 8.3+)

simpleValidator.$comment: This is the base validator definition for all validators. It is extended by the actual validators below.

validationErrorMessage.description: The custom error message to be shown if the validation fails. Neos 8.0+

when.$comment: EEL-expression to determine whether the template should be applied

name.$comment: Identify the child node this template is applied to by this name

superTypes.$comment: Provide the most commonly used supertypes for autocompletion

preset.description: A child node preset as configured in `Neos.Neos.nodeTypes.presets.childNodes`.

previewIcon.description: This setting defines the icon that will be used in the tile view of the NodeType selection dialog. Neos 8.0+

previewIconSize.description: The previewIconSize setting defines the size of the previewIcon. By default, the previewIcon has the size "2x". Neos 8.0+
